Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
ClassificationParadigmParadigm to be used by the OCR process to classify the patterns found in a press clip
ClassifierClassifier of the OCR process

DatasetData set of character samples encoded as feature vectors

NessieExceptionException raised by a NessieOcr object
PatternSet of pixels that defines a pattern to be recognized as a character in classification stage
